chord.program
Class CHAProgram

java.lang.Object
  chord.program.Program
      chord.program.CHAProgram

public class CHAProgram
extends Program

Class Hierarchy Analysis algorithm for computing program scope (reachable classes and methods).

Author:
Mayur Naik (mhn@cs.stanford.edu)
